about_the_game:
Rich MILF Drama is a short novel about a guy who works in a "rent-a-gent" agency. He helps lonely women with house-related stuff (fixing plumbing problems, electrical circuits or just do the household chores), but he can also accompany women on dates or public events. The only rule — no unnecessary physical contact with any of clients, even if they are the ones who initiate it.

However, one of the clients turns out to be his crush from high school, who is suddenly very interested in him. Will he be able to resist or will he break the rules for her?

Rich MILF Drama, despite containing "drama" in its name, is a light story about affection, carrier, dreams and goals from the past, happiness and love.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

name: Rich MILF Drama
short_description: Every lady needs a gentleman, both for love and practical help. Struggle to get one? Just hire a man from "rent-a-gent" and he will do everything you need!
